reviewText: Got this awhile ago and just had the chance to place it in my video cassette recorder and it kept spitting it out. My vcr is fine because it plays other tapes well. Something's wrong with this tape.

Great video!  I used this before my wedding and was in great shape on the big day.  I wish they'd re-release it on DVD, but if you've still got a VCR, this is the best workout tape to have, you'll feel the burn in your thighs and abs and start seeing results quickly.  Bikinis, bikinis, think bikinis.

This is a wonderful video.  It hits all the major body parts for toning.  The  setting and the music  are nice.  I love this video because it does not take up too much time  20 - 25 minutes and it works.  You will look  and feel better if you  do it regularly.  It is one of my favorite videos.
